metadata.title: CVE-2024-25714 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In Rhonabwy through 1.1.13, HMAC signature verification uses a strcmpfunction that is vulnerable to side-channel attacks, because it stops thecomparison when the first difference is spotted in the two signatures. (Thefix uses gnutls_memcmp, which has constant-time execution.)

criterions.comment: rhonabwy package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
